header.text: $VULT is a cash-back application token (CBAT) and can be staked to receive $USDC.

airdrop.main_title:
how to participate in THE
$5M VULTISIG AIRDROP

items.title: download </br> app
items.description: Start by downloading the Vultisig app from the App Store or Google Play to get access to the platform and airdrop.

items.title: setup multi-factor wallet
items.description: Create a Vultisig Vault with multi-factor authentication to protect your assets and enhance your accountâ€™s security.

items.title: Backup your Vault
items.description: Each device in a vault has its on backup share. Back it up.

items.title: transfer funds to vaults
items.description: Deposit funds into Vultisig vaults to qualify for the airdrop and participate in platform activities.

items.title: join the </br> airdrop
items.description: Join the airdrop and follow the leaderboard on <a href=`aidrop.vultisig.com`>AIDROP.VULTISIG.COM<span>

faq.q: How do I register for the airdrop?
faq.a:
Become a Vultisig user and join the airdrop calculation.

Note: The airdrop is based on the total amount in your vault multiplied by the time the assets are held in the vault.The largest amounts for the longest time earn the most. Read more about it here. here.

faq.q: What assets are counted for the Airdrop?
faq.a:
Layer 1 assets and most tokens supported by Vultisig are counted. Other active assets such as LPs and Node Bonds from THORChain, MAYA Protocol and staked token are also valid.See the full list here.

You can register as many vaults as you wish.
Your assets will accumulate VULTIES over a period of 12 months. At the end of this period, you will receive your share of the airdrop (5% of $VULT).
